page.title: 13SPORT AND RECREATION
page.content: Most sports are well catered for in the Kirkby Stephen area. { Soccer}is played competively by men & boys on the{Hills bottom}ground.Next to them is the 100 years old{Cricket {Club}who have one of the best pitches in the county. The young{Rugby Club}is in West Garth where both ground & club were made by both younger & older members. {Badminton & Tennis}are played at the Grammar School.Coaching courses for juveniles have been organised to encourage new members. {Bowling}on the crown green by the river is popular with old & young. The fell search is 12 years old.All its members are walking enthusiasts. {The Eden,}an excellent trout river is popular with residents and visitors. Some Kirkby Stephen people play {golf} on the 18 hole course at Appleby.
